page.title: 18Garages.
page.content: In the village there are two garages. One is{"The Barge"}garage,Ingatestone Road,and the other is the{Blackmore {Service Station}on the roundabout. "The Barge" was once a pub and a dairy. A cowshed used to stand where the{garage}is now. There are two main buildings the old "Barge Cottage"and the workshop where Mr. Wakelin and Mr. Metchear work. There are two pumps and the current{price of petrol}is Â£2.04. The garage does M.O.T. tests, services and general maintenance . The service station, besides doing genral maintenance on vehicles, sells {calor gas}cylinders and appliances. It also has a{trade}in second hand car, accessories,batteries and bicycles. Their petrol price is Â£2:04\ and they have two pumps. Both garages say the busiest time of the year is during the winter period.
